title: This Game-Mode is INSANE | Little Witch Eve

embed.description: Hiya :) Naturally I had to make an ARURF video. Unfortunately I don't get Eve every time, but an Eve URF video will be coming soon :D Thanks for watching xD My stream: https://mixer.com/CynderIsAwkward Twitter: @cynderisawkward Music: 「Nightcore」DESPACITO - Marimo

body:
Hiya :)

I am very proud of the moment at 1:48 in the video, and think that's the best part. I know the music isn't to everyone's taste, but my main concern was attempting to sync the gameplay with the beats in the song. Naturally, the fast pacing of Despacito suited an URF video xD

Please let me know what you think... any and all advice would be much appreciated.

Thanks :)

replies.body:
Nightcore - no
Anime music - no
Electro/techy music - no
Selena Gomez - no
Disney music - no
Fast-paced music in a different language which suits URF - no

Well what music can I use, then? Every single video I try a different kind of music, and every time there is nothing but complaints about the music. No one ever complains about the content because they just close the video after a few seconds :(

My next video is going to have something from the *League of Legends* OST. Surely that would be acceptable?

What else can I do?
just use we are number one
